supporting_quotes: Knighted, Carey Mulligan and Sarah Lancashire Made Commanders of British Empire in U.K. New Year Honors List
The London Gazette (Supplement). 30 December 2024. p. N9.
assembled_events.notes: The role 'Commander of the British Empire' is clearly an honor, and the context suggests it is an award rather than an active position.

issues.description: The event is missing the organization that conferred the award. While 'The London Gazette' and 'Variety' are mentioned, the conferring organization (e.g., the British government) is not explicitly stated.
The quote mentions 'Knighted' which might imply a different honor than 'Commander of the British Empire'. Clarification is needed to ensure the event is accurately described.
